mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.kecheng_name as kechengName ,a.kecheng_photo as kechengPhoto ,a.shangke_time as shangkeTime ,a.xiake_time as xiakeTime ,a.kecheng_types as kechengTypes ,a.banji_types as banjiTypes ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.kecheng_content as kechengContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_uuid_number as jiaoshiUuidNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete as jiaoshiDelete
FROM kecheng a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.kecheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengName},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.shangke_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shangkeTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.shangke_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.shangkeTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xiake_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiakeTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xiake_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiakeTimeEnd})
and a.kecheng_types = #{params.kechengTypes}
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.kecheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechengContent},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete >= #{params.jiaoshiDeleteStart}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete <= #{params.jiaoshiDeleteEnd}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete = #{params.jiaoshiDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
